title: Learning rate scheduler have different APIs
body_html:
The default API for step is either step() or step(epoch): https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/optim/lr_scheduler.py#L26

The default API for ReduceLROnPlateau is step(metric):
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/optim/lr_scheduler.py#L252

Moreover, this is not documented. In fact, none of the LR schedulers have .step documented. Please either document this thoroughly or fix it.
http://pytorch.org/docs/master/optim.html#how-to-adjust-learning-rate
